definition: to put a roof (on a building)/to cap the roof (finishing a building project)/fig. to put a ceiling (on spending, prize, ambition etc)/to top off/fig. to reach the highest point (of growth, profit, interest rates)/to stop growing (of plant bud or branch)
surname Feng
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
ceremony of capping the roof (to mark the completion of a building project)

sentences.english: Chesney and Sugarland capped Country Thunder 2007 before a large audience.
sentences.chinese: 切斯尼和糖城封顶大量观众前国家雷霆2007。

sentences.english: He is going to top the barn tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 他打算明天给粮仓封顶。
l该封顶计划没有追溯力。

sentences.english: BP oil company is preparing its latest effort to cap the 6-week-old oil leak.
sentences.chinese: BP石油公司正准实施为期六周的石油泄漏封顶法。

sentences.english: The south cable bent tower of Jing Yue Yangtze River Bridge (Suzhou to Yueyang) has been sealed smoothly as scheduled.
sentences.chinese: 日前，荆岳长江公路大桥南面索塔顺利封顶。

sentences.english: It has since agreed to negotiate a cap.
sentences.chinese: 自那以后，昆州同意协商河水提取量的封顶值。

sentences.english: Developers are currently not allowed to pre-sell units in new buildings until the roof is on.
sentences.chinese: 现在房子封顶前不允许开发商们预售单元房。

definition: to finish work/to complete a project
to complete a project
to join the two sections (of a linear structure: bridge, dike etc) to complete its construction
to start (a building project)
construction/to carry out construction or large-scale repairs
foundation groove/trench for building foundation
to lay railway track
to complete the last stage of work/to round off
gallery seat (in theater)
to begin work (of a factory or engineering operation)/to start a construction job
to establish/to build
civil engineering/same as 土木工程[tu3 mu4 gong1 cheng2]
advance sale/to sell in advance/to book
engineering/an engineering project/project/undertaking/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
time allocated for a project/completion date
fundamentally complete/basically finished
